original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimized_prompt:
<instructions>
    Extract named entities from the following text and classify them into the categories: <entity>Person</entity>, <entity>Location</entity>, and <entity>Organization</entity>.
  </instructions>
  <context>
    The text contains discussions regarding consumer safety in relation to British lamb amidst concerns of mad cow disease, with specific individuals and organizations mentioned.
  </context>
  <steps>
    1. Identify all named entities within the given text.
    2. Classify each entity into one of the following categories: <entity>Person</entity>, <entity>Location</entity>, or <entity>Organization</entity>.
  </steps>
  <example>
    Input: "EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb. Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS."
    Output: 
      - Person: "Peter Blackburn"
      - Location: "BRUSSELS"
      - Organization: "EU"
  </example>
